title: lag on euw server
body:
hey riot.
i have played some games yesterday and today and i have noticed some kind of lag, i dont know what it is, its not my fps and not my ping.
so im very confused about what it could be, so plz riot answer me on this, why is it lagging when im playing leauge :/

replies.body:
Often times when you see 'lag' that is not reflected in either your FPS or Latency (ping), it is caused by Packet loss. Packet loss is when a percentage of the packets of data you send get lost along the way to the servers. These packets are crucial because they are bits of information that tell the server which actions you are meaning to take (cast an ability, move your character, interact with a creature or champion) and if they get lost or delayed, it can create big problems for you.

Our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over the most common solutions for packet loss. Let me know if those steps helped you with this issue.
